findings.title: Out of gas exception in includeInReward() function
findings.description: The function includeInReward() uses a loop to find and remove addresses from the _excluded list, which can cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if the excluded addresses list is too long.

findings.title: Out of gas exception in _getCurrentSupply function
findings.description: The function _getCurrentSupply uses a loop to evaluate total supply and could be aborted with OUT_OF_GAS exception if there will be a long excluded addresses list.

findings.title: Swap and liquify function does not add liquidity
findings.description: The Swap and liquify function sends 1/50 to charity, 1/50 to dev, 1/100 to marketing, but does not add liquidity. The remaining liquidity amount stays on the contract.

findings.title: Owner privileges (In the period when the owner is not renounced)
findings.description: The contract owner has excessive privileges to modify critical settings and variables, including adding/removing addresses from _blackListedBots, changing tax and liquidity fees, maximum transaction amount, excluding from fee, Uniswap router address, and dev/marketing/charity wallets.
